fields.name: Usage: /role <role>
fields.value: Opens the role edit menu to modify the automated attributes of this **role**.

fields.name: Toggle adding to new members
fields.value: Enabling this causes the role to be added to users when they join the server.

fields.name: Toggle adding to inactive members
fields.value: Enabling this causes the role to be added to users when they become inactive for the duration specified in the server settings.

fields.name: Toggle requesting
fields.value: Enabling this allows users to add and remove this role from themselves using the **/requestrole** command.

fields.name: Toggle time parameter
fields.value: If requesting is enabled, enabling this only allows users to temporarily add this role.

fields.name: Set agreement
fields.value: Setting an agreement will require users to agree to it before receiving this role. Leave blank to disable.

fields.name: Set roles to add if removed
fields.value: Pressing this opens a select menu that allows you to select a list of roles that gets added to the user if this role gets removed through **/requestrole** or from a temporary role getting removed.

fields.name: Set roles to remove if added
fields.value: Pressing this opens a select menu that allows you to select a list of roles that gets removed from the user if this role gets added through **/requestrole** or if this it gets added through inactivity.

fields.name: Save
fields.value: This saves any edits to the role.

fields.name: Clear data
fields.value: This removes all attributes from the role.
